view_Welcome_info.message: You currently don't have any accounts.

view_Welcome_invitation.message: Create your first account to get started.

view_Welcome_import.message: Import an Account from pre-existing phrase

view_Warning_emphasis.message: The next Step is very important!

view_Warning_explanation.message: Please write down your wallet's phrase and keep it in a safe place. We recommend you write down your backup phrase with a pencil and paper. The phrase must be used to restore your wallet.

view_Warning_emphasis_again.message: Keep it carefully to not lose your assets

view_Warning_CTA.message: I understand this - go to the Phrase

view_SaveBackupPhrase_explanation.message: You have to click or tap an empty field to see one word of the phrase. For the next step, you need your written words in the correct order.

view_ImportBackupPhrase_explanation.message: Import a Sporran-Account from a pre-existing phrase use 12-word mnemonic seed

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_invalid_ba.message: The entered backup phrase doesn’t exist

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_backup_phr.message: Please insert all the words of the backup phrase

view_ImportBackupPhrase_error_invalid_wo.message: It looks like there’s a typo in word $number$: [$word$]

view_CreatePassword_per_account.message: You need a separate password for each account.

view_CreatePassword_explanation.message: To protect your account this password has to be secure. A good example would be a sentence of several words with numbers and punctuation, like this:

view_CreatePassword_criteria_cases.message: Use both uppercase and lowercase letters

view_CreatePassword_criteria_length.message: Use at least 12 characters in total

view_CreatePassword_error_cases.message: You need to use both uppercase and lowercase letters

view_CreatePassword_error_numbers.message: You need to use at least one number

view_CreatePassword_error_other.message: You need to use at least one special character

view_CreatePassword_error_length.message: You need to use at least $minimum$ characters

view_CreateAccountSuccess_message.message: You have successfully created a KILT-Wallet
